  2. Asia-Pacific markets mixed as Trump administration prepares to roll out fresh tariffs  CNBC
  3. Stock market today: Wall Street swings in final hours of trading before Trump's tariff announcement  AP News
  4. Asian shares are sharply lower over concerns about the U.S. economy  NPR
  5. Emerging Currencies Steady After China Data With US Tariffs Eyed  Bloomberg.com
